artist: Painter: After Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: river landscape with castle on rocks above at center; figure kneeling in water in foreground; herdsman with dog and herd on grassy island beyond
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: 54 /Loutherbourg pinx / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain
portfolio: From from "Cabinet Poullain; Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'apres les tableaux & dessing qui composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain", plate 54
title: Print
